TextView.android:text: In the State of Missouri, knives are illegal to be carried concealed. A knife is defined as, ' any dagger, dirk, stiletto, or bladed hand instrument that is readily capable of inflicting serious physical injury or death by cutting or stabbing a person.' per RSMO 571.010. \n \nHowever, a folding knife, that has a single edge, that is no more than 4 inches in length, is not defined as a knife in the State of Missouri per RSMO 571.010 (12)
